title: Double Decker! Doug & Kirill
alternative_title: DOUBLE DECKER! ダグ&キリル, DOUBLE DECKER! Doug and Kirill
status: DOUBLE DECKER! ダグ&キリル, DOUBLE DECKER! Doug and Kirill
description:
Description :
        SEVEN-O agents’ work is all about controlling illegal operations related to a drug called Anthem. They operete under the “double decker system”, and this how the veteran Doug Billingham and the novice Kirill Vrubel ended up working together.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 1.5: Howl At The Two Suns!
